name: ListPaymentMethodDomains
description:
Retrieve details of existing payment method domains.

Use this tool to get a list of all payment method domains and their associated details. This can be helpful for managing or reviewing your payment configurations.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.description: Specify the domain name for the payment method domain object you want to represent.

value_schema.description: The domain name that this payment method domain object represents.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor_ending_before
parameters.description: A cursor ID to fetch the previous page of the payment method domain list in pagination.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `ending_before` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with `obj_bar`, your subsequent call can include `ending_before=obj_bar` in order to fetch the previous page of the list.

parameters.name: fields_to_expand
parameters.description: List of fields in the response to expand for more detailed information.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: limit_number_of_returned_objects
parameters.description: Specify the number of payment method domains to return, ranging from 1 to 100. Default is 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor_starting_after
parameters.description: An object ID cursor to fetch the next page in the list.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `starting_after` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with `obj_foo`, your subsequent call can include `starting_after=obj_foo` in order to fetch the next page of the list.

parameters.name: include_enabled_domains
parameters.description: Include only enabled payment method domains in the results. If false, all domains will be included regardless of status.

value_schema.description: Whether this payment method domain is enabled. If the domain is not enabled, payment methods will not appear in Elements or Embedded Checkout
